title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: A book guide on how to change your habits and get 1% better every day

title: and so the silent voices sang
author: Dominique Alonga
description: An anthology of four stories. All covering the lives of those we disregard the most and dealing with prejudices, judgements and misconceptions.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: A novel about a young man who travels to a desert to find a treasure. He meets a wise man who teaches him about the power of dreams and the importance of following your dreams.

title: The silent patient
author: Alex Michaelides
description: a psychological thriller of a woman's act of violence against her husband and of the therapist obsessed with uncovering her motive.

title: Things Fall Apart
author: Chinua Achebe
description: A novel about pre-colonial life in Nigeria and the arrival of Europeans.

title: Half of a Yellow Sun
author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie
description: A story set during the Nigerian Civil War, exploring love and loss.

title: The Fishermen
author: Chigozie Obioma
description: A story of four brothers in a small Nigerian town whose lives are changed by a prophecy.
